name: Balloon Picker
description:
You are a balloon who hopes to escape to the sky but the other balloons are keeping you from leaving. Resist the balloons and avoid  touching them. 

Use the up key to move up to the window.

Starting screen music: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/happy-music/2

Main music: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/happy-music/2

Touched by another balloon sfx: https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/lose/

Kids cheering sfx: https://www.myinstants.com/en/instant/kids-cheering/

Ending music: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/happy-music/2
